actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that retired officers of the Armed Forces recalled to active duty and detailed to duty with the American Battle Monuments Commission shall not be charged against the authorized end strength level prescribed for the military department concerned.

summary.text: Stipulates that the recalling to duty and assignment on a full-time basis of any retired member of the armed forces to the American Battle Monuments Commission shall not be chargeable against the authorized end strengths of the military departments concerned.

titles.title: A bill to provide that retired officers of the Armed Forces recalled to active duty and detailed to duty with the American Battle Monuments Commission shall not be charged against the authorized end strength level prescribed for the military department concerned.
